## Prerequisites & Requirements

To get the most out of this workshop, participants should have:

::: {.row}
::: {.col-md-6}
::: {.content-section}
### Technical Requirements

- **Operating System**: Windows 10+, macOS 10.14+, or Ubuntu 18.04+
- **RAM**: Minimum 8GB (16GB recommended)
- **Storage**: At least 10GB free space
- **Internet**: Stable broadband connection
- **Browser**: Chrome, Firefox, or Safari (latest versions)
:::
:::

::: {.col-md-6}
::: {.content-section}
### Knowledge Prerequisites

- Basic understanding of **R programming**
- Familiarity with **RStudio interface**
- Basic **statistical concepts**
- Experience with **health/clinical data** (helpful but not required)
- Understanding of **data privacy** concepts
:::
:::
:::

## Pre-Workshop Setup

Complete these steps **at least 3 days before** the workshop:

::: {.callout-important}
## Essential Setup Tasks

### 1. üìä Install R (v4.0+) and RStudio

**R Statistical Software:**
- Download from: [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/)
- Choose the version for your operating system
- Follow the installation wizard

**RStudio Desktop:**
- Download from: [Posit](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/)
- Free version is sufficient
- Install after R is installed

### 2. üì¶ Install Required Packages

Run this script in RStudio to install all necessary packages:

```r
# Install DataSHIELD packages
install.packages(c("DSI", "DSOpal", "dsBaseClient", "dsHelper"),
                 repos = c("https://cran.obiba.org", 
                          "https://cloud.r-project.org"))

# Install additional analysis packages
install.packages(c("tidyverse", "ggplot2", "tableone", 
                   "survival", "metafor"))

# Install OMOP CDM tools
install.packages("DatabaseConnector")
install.packages("SqlRender")

# Verify installation
library(dsBaseClient)
library(DSOpal)
```

### 3. üîê Test Server Access

- You'll receive credentials via email 1 week before the workshop
- Test connection using provided script
- Report any issues immediately to [workshop-support@isglobal.org](mailto:workshop-support@isglobal.org)

### 4. üìö Review Pre-Reading Materials

**Required Reading (60 minutes total):**
- Introduction to DataSHIELD (30 min)
- OMOP CDM Overview (20 min)
- Workshop Guide (10 min)

**Optional Background:**
- [DataSHIELD: taking the analysis to the data](https://doi.org/10.1093/ije/dyu188)
- [The Book of OHDSI](https://ohdsi.github.io/TheBookOfOhdsi/)
:::

## Test Your Setup

Before the workshop, verify your installation:

```r
# Test script (example - servers will be activated during workshop)

packageVersion("dsBaseClient")

```

::: {.callout-tip}
## Installation Troubleshooting

**Common Issues:**

**Problem**: "Package 'xyz' is not available"
```r
# Solution 1: Use alternative repository
install.packages("xyz", repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org")

# Solution 2: Install from GitHub
devtools::install_github("datashield/packagename")
```

**Problem**: "Non-zero exit status"
- Update R to latest version
- Install Rtools (Windows) or Xcode (Mac)
- Check internet connection

**Problem**: "Cannot connect to Opal server"
- Check VPN connection (if required)
- Verify credentials
- Test with ping command
- Check firewall settings
:::
